CustomField.description: Leave this box checked if you want the price to be filled automatically from the default price book. If you like to enter a price manually for this part, simply uncheck this box.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Leave this box checked if you want the price to be filled automatically from the default price book. If you like to enter a price manually for this part, simply uncheck this box.
CustomField.label: Use Price From Pricebook
